Our core values are transparency and honesty. We have created gowago.ch so that you can easily shop and find the car and monthly payment that fits your lifestyle.
tags: Automotive, Car Sharing, Leasing, Subscription Service

name: Glassnode
businessDescription:
Glassnode is a blockchain data and intelligence provider that generates innovative on-chain metrics and tools for digital asset stakeholders.Gathering data from multiple blockchains and generating meaningful information from it necessitates high operational costs and time commitments, as well as a comprehensive infrastructure of databases, tools, and skilled data scientists.

Our world-class team and infrastructure allow for a degree of quality and scale that can only be achieved through specialisation. Glassnode is your gateway to on-chain data.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Bitcoin, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Data Visualization, FinTech, Information Technology, Internet, Machine Learning, Software

name: Qnami
businessDescription: We use quantum physics to produce fundamental new technology at Qnami. Controlling and measuring the state of a single electron allows us to measure things that were previously impossible to measure. We call this quantum sensing, and we're working hard to better people's lives and the world around them. Qnami is a company that develops quantum sensing technology for nanoscale imaging. It enables science and industry to measure what has never been measured before, allowing people's lives and the world to better. Qnami's product is utilised for MRAM characterisation, protein imaging, and fundamental studies on superconductors, among other things.
tags: Biotechnology, Health Care, Information Technology, Sensor

name: RoomPriceGenie
businessDescription: Smaller hotels can use RoomPriceGenie's smart pricing software. RoomPriceGenie provides (independent) hoteliers with dynamic pricing. The system is already being used by more than 130 small and medium-sized hotels around the world.

name: SMART VALOR
businessDescription:
-SMART VALOR is a financial technology firm that runs a cryptocurrency and digital asset exchange.
SMART VALOR provides custody, trading, and brokerage to customers from 130 countries as a fully compliant exchange regulated by Liechtenstein's financial supervisory authorities.
The company is backed by international institutional investors as well as a corporate venture fund generated by renowned Swiss corporations such as Credit Suisse, Zurich KantonalBank, Nestle, Novartis, and others, and has been named one of Europe's 10 Most Exciting Technology SMEs by Forbes.
tags: Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Finance, Financial Exchanges, Financial Services, FinTech, SaaS

name: Sleepiz
businessDescription:
Sleepiz is a firm located in Zürich that aims to help the medical sector bring healthcare into the home. With a device that can be placed on the bedside table, Sleepiz delivers an easy and pleasant option. The device is non-contact and uses medical-grade accuracy to quantify movements resulting from heart contractions and breathing patterns, as well as body motions.
Sleepiz will be able to diagnose sleep abnormalities as well as undertake long-term monitoring in the future thanks to the utilisation of wireless millimetre wave technology, sensor fusion, and artificial intelligence. Chronic illness progression can be tracked in this way, allowing for quicker intervention and better treatment.

name: Tangem
businessDescription:
Tangem creates secure microchips, smart cards, and other embedded solutions that include native blockchain functionality. The company buys integrated semiconductor platforms directly from companies like Samsung and NXP, as well as fabricating its own chip designs at UMC in Singapore and Taiwan.
The resulting products have unrivalled levels of security compliance, with CEA-Leti and EMVCo evaluating the silicon design and manufacturing, and Kudelski Security and Applus+ auditing the code and architecture.
Tangem provides full products such as smart banknotes, hardware wallets, cold storage, contactless HSM, and encrypted bearer notes in the B2B2C and Enterprise industries. The company also works with a number of state- and national-level central banks throughout the world, providing knowledge to significant institutions in the fintech sector.
tags: Blockchain, Cryptocurrency, Electronics, FinTech, Security, Semiconductor

name: Status.im
businessDescription:
Status aspires to provide a safe communication platform that respects human rights. Designed to enhance individual sovereignty while allowing free flow of information and protecting the right to private, secure discussions. Status is a web3 browser, a crypto wallet, and an open source messaging. Built with cutting-edge technology and a focus on security and privacy.
We are a global workforce that collaborates remotely from all corners of the globe. We work in small groups of two to five persons to achieve a specific goal.

name: Diamond Digital
businessDescription: Diamond Digital develops a crypto-currency backed by diamonds. The crypto-currency is issued on the Ethereum1 Blockchain, and it follows both the ERC202 standard for interoperability and the suggested ERC621 3 standard for increasing and decreasing token supply. Ethereum smart contracts guarantee that there cannot be more DiamondCoins in the system than diamonds used as collateral. DiamondCoins can always be redeemed for auxiliary diamonds as a consequence. Diamond Digital began operation in 2017. It has headquarters in Feusisberg in Switzerland.
tags: Cryptocurrency, Finance, Financial Exchanges, Financial Services, FinTech

name: Bright Peak Therapeutics
businessDescription: At Bright Peak we use our proprietary chemical protein synthesis technology to create rationally designed cytokines with improved therapeutic properties, overcoming the functional limitations of first-generation therapies. Our synthesis platform provides unparalleled flexibility to engineer cytokines, allowing us to simultaneously fine-tune biological properties while adding exploitable features such as conjugation handles.

name: TONI Digital
businessDescription: TONI Digital is dismantling the old insurance value chain in order to build a value network with trusted partners. For everyone – end customers, partners, and internal systems – they emphasise on lean, simple, and automated operations. Their disjointed value chain and automation efforts are resulting in scale consequences and cost advantages that were not anticipated. They are a B2B company with no prior experience as a direct insurer. They simply do what is best for you — they don't care about their legacy. They take over all aspects of your insurance company's operations, including product management and customer service. You merely bring the name of the company.

name: Transfero Group
businessDescription: Transfero is a global firm based in Zug, Switzerland, in the heart of the Crypto Valley. The adoption of digital assets is our key goal. On the basis of Blockchain technology, we provide private solutions. We believe in disrupting established markets and so provide an exclusive experience for both individual and institutional clients who seek to acquire access to this new asset class.

name: Unit8
businessDescription: Unit8 is a Swiss firm that specialises in solving challenges in large sectors such as chemical, pharmaceutical, automotive, and finance. Our staff included world-class professionals in machine learning and software engineering who had previously worked for Google, Amazon, Palantir, or Microsoft. We collaborate with some of the world's largest corporations to solve problems that directly influence their operations, finance, manufacturing, and research and development. Apart from that, Unit8 devotes a portion of its resources and time to causes that are important to us, such as pro bono work and case engineering.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Consulting, Information Technology, Machine Learning, Software

name: Urovant Sciences
businessDescription: Urovant Sciences is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical business specialising on the development and commercialization of novel urologic treatments. Vibegron, an oral, once-daily small molecule beta-3 agonist under development for overactive bladder (OAB), OAB in males with benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH), and pain associated with irritable bowel syndrome, is our flagship product candidate (IBS). URO-902, Urovant's second experimental product candidate, is a new gene therapy for patients with overactive bladder symptoms who have failed to respond to oral pharmaceutical treatment.

name: viso.ai
businessDescription:
The Viso Suite is a collection of software that allows computers to see. It is suitable for all types of enterprises. It's designed to provide you everything you need to create, develop, and run visual AI applications.
Visual AI's Best in Class:
Viso Suite is a low-code cloud platform that provides a visual programming interface for building robust visual AI applications in the quickest time feasible. It is industry-agnostic, hardware-agnostic, high-performing, and scalable.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Computer Vision, Internet of Things, Machine Learning, SaaS, Software

name: AC BioScience
businessDescription: AC BioScience is a biotech start-up with a unique business plan and ambition. We're committed to finding novel ways to treat a variety of malignancies. The business is driving a paradigm change in cancer therapies, founded by Andreas Schläpfer and Professor Christian Auclair, an internationally recognised expert in molecular oncology. The EPFL Innovation Park near Lausanne is where the company is based, and it celebrated its first anniversary in March 2018.

name: Anapaya
businessDescription:
Anapaya is creating a global B2B network based on a cutting-edge internet protocol for the twenty-first century!
We create the technology that powers this next-generation B2B network and bring it to market through our own global backbone and our partner service providers (ISPs, IXPs, colo and datacenter operators, cloud service providers, and managed services providers), combining: - the security and reliability of private networks - with the universality and openness of today's internet.
Our technology assists businesses in meeting the demands for reliability, security, performance, and compliance that have arisen as a result of the exponential growth of the internet.

name: ARTIDIS
businessDescription:
We at ARTIDIS AG are dedicated to using nanotechnology and innovation to dramatically improve health outcomes. Our ground-breaking new nanotechnology tool for cancer diagnosis and treatment aims to improve people's lives by drastically cutting the time it takes to accurately diagnose breast cancer from days or weeks to as little as three hours, minimizing worry and lost time. ARTIDISTM will also improve people's lives by allowing them to receive individualized treatments based on exact measures of the cancer's aggressiveness as well as their own medical data and histories.
We believe that same-day diagnosis and therapy tailored to the person are the way of the future in health care. We also believe that the most recent breakthroughs in cutting-edge research should inform medicine.

name: Bond Mobility
businessDescription:
BOND was founded with the goal of altering societies and how cities operate by giving residents more choices. BOND Mobility, the world's first station-free e-Bike sharing company, manufactures Swiss-designed premium e-Bikes with top speeds of 45 kph. It was founded in 2016 in Switzerland and has offices in Zurich and Palo Alto, California. BOND Mobility is present in a number of European locations and is fast expanding globally. BOND Mobility is one of Europe's fastest growing tech businesses in 2020, according to the RED Herring TOP 100.
The company's 60+ employees are working to make cities more active, healthy, and sustainable all across the world. The approach of BOND Mobility has been scientifically proven to replace vehicle trips and complement public transportation.

name: Candi
businessDescription: Candi gives organisations of all sizes the simplest, most efficient method to take advantage of solar power for their business, combining the finest of its Swiss heritage and significant local presence. Candi provides rooftop solar for small businesses and industries.

name: COFCO International
businessDescription:
COFCO International is a worldwide agribusiness focused on being a leader in the global grains, oilseeds, and sugar supply chains, with a clear vision, strong principles, and a good culture.
We responsibly offer the food that the world requires. We are an ambitious company based in Geneva, Switzerland, with the proper structures and culture to fulfil the world's growing and changing demands.
Our global portfolio comprises assets in the Americas, Europe, Africa, the Middle East, and Asia-Pacific, and we employ over 11,000 people in 35 countries. We do business with over 50 countries and give farmers direct access to the rapidly expanding Chinese market.

name: COFCO International
businessDescription:
COFCO International is a worldwide agribusiness focused on being a leader in the global grains, oilseeds, and sugar supply chains, with a clear vision, strong principles, and a good culture.
We responsibly offer the food that the world requires. We are an ambitious company based in Geneva, Switzerland, with the proper structures and culture to fulfil the world's growing and changing demands.
Our global portfolio comprises assets in the Americas, Europe, Africa, the Middle East, and Asia-Pacific, and we employ over 11,000 people in 35 countries. We do business with over 50 countries and give farmers direct access to the rapidly expanding Chinese market.

businessDescription: Striving towards the future of urban mobility, Enuu is the first micro-mobility service based on E-Pods with four wheels and a full bodywork. Enuu offers a sharing service for the last mile using light electric vehicles and a revolutionary advertising platform.
tags: CleanTech, Electric Vehicle, GreenTech, Last Mile Transportation, Transportation

name: Houzy
businessDescription:
With strong partners, a wealth of specialist knowledge, and a fast developing community, Houzy is building Switzerland's top platform for house ownership. The open ecosystem includes user-friendly online tools including property appraisal, renewal fund calculator, and plant manager, and connects homeowners and craftsmen with a single click. Houzy is always growing and adding new features, partners, and tools.
We intelligently connect data and information to generate personalised suggestions for homeowners. For instance, when should a heating system be replaced and how much money should be set up for it?
tags: Facility Management, Information Technology, Real Estate, Software

name: Instimatch Global
businessDescription:
For treasuries all around the world, Instimatch Global provides a cash management platform that includes Unsecured Cash Deposits, Repos, FX, and digital Promissory Notes.
By bringing price discovery, liquidity depth, and deal negotiation to traders' fingertips, the platform enables unprecedented access to global liquidity and unparalleled speed throughout the trade lifecycle, while leveraging data analytics and sophisticated synthetic models to highlight latent opportunities.
Instimatch has over 170 institutional clients across 22 jurisdictions and is based in Zurich, Edinburgh, and Doha.

name: MetrioPharm
businessDescription:
MetrioPharm is working on a new class of immunomodulators that target active macrophages and inflammatory tissues.
MP1032 from MetrioPharm works at the top of the inflammation cascade, where high amounts of reactive oxygen species (ROS) cause cellular oxidative stress and, as a result, a variety of disease processes.
MP1032 is a brand-new ROS scavenger with a short molecule structure. The chemical decreases inflammatory indicators like TNF-alpha, IL-6, and IL-12 by targeting cellular oxidative stress, while keeping ROS at physiological levels required for normal cellular function.

name: Monetha
businessDescription:
Monetha is of the belief that user control over their digital footprint can pave the way for a more equitable interaction between consumers and businesses, benefiting all parties involved.

Monetha makes your data work for you. We enable individuals to control their digital profiles and receive rewards for their data. 

By interacting with companies in a usual manner, users earn points redeemable for products, vouchers, and cryptocurrencies, or gain access to exclusive deals and discounts. Companies, in turn, equipped with your preferences, can better cater to your needs and earn your loyalty.

Think of your digital profile as a universal discount card that opens the door to an array of benefits.
tags: blockchain, information technology, martech, affiliate marketing

name: Nanoleq
businessDescription: Nanoleq is a product development firm founded by and for people. Our purpose is to give everyone the tools they need to live a life focused on happiness and health. Our employees have a wide range of skills, including successful entrepreneurship, sales, branding, marketing, and production, as well as material, mechanical, chemical, electrical, and textile engineering.

name: SwissBorg
businessDescription: We are a team of finance and technology experts dedicated to democratising wealth management by making it fun, fair and community-centric. SwissBorg is revolutionizing wealth management services with a community-centric approach powered by blockchain technology. We are a wealthtech DAO offering Swiss-made crypto investment solutions to the world.
tags: Blockchain, Communities, Financial Services, FinTech, Wealth Management

name: privatemarket.io
businessDescription:
Privatemarket.io is a blockchain-based digital marketplace that acts as a distribution and investment platform for alternative investment products and services, focusing on low-liquid assets like as private equity and real estate.
On the investor side, we provide administration, custody, reporting, and support throughout the product's existence. They may easily access world-class managers and strategies, as well as on-demand due diligence services and unique liquidity management solutions, thanks to the open platform.

name: Quadient
businessDescription: Quadient is at the heart of the world's most memorable consumer experiences. Quadient simplifies the link between people and what matters by focusing on three major solution areas: Intelligent Communication Automation, Parcel Locker Solutions, and Mail-Related Solutions. Hundreds of thousands of consumers throughout the world rely on Quadient to help them build meaningful, personalised connections and deliver exceptional customer service. Because ties are important.

name: Sogur
businessDescription: Sögur (formerly Saga) is the project behind the worldwide digital currency SGR (previously SGA), which is intended to be the democratic progression of money. Based on a bonding curve model, SGR is built to integrate the volatility of crypto markets' demand - creating opportunities for intrinsic value growth while also employing stabilization methods to mitigate the risk of value loss in uncertain market situations. The SGR economy was designed to expand and self-sustain, to be guided by its holders, and to represent the genuine growth of money.
tags: Cryptocurrency, Digital Signage, Financial Services, Professional Services, Virtual Currency

name: Lookthrough
businessDescription: Lookthrough provides tools to streamline the collection and organization of ESG data. Fueling reporting on non-public real estate to help lower CO2 and reduce cost of financing. A frictionless cloud platform to collect and benchmark ESG data on all types of real estate. Lookthrough effortlessly integrates all necessary counterparties for automated reporting and ESG recommendations across all real estate types.
tags: Enterprise Software, Financial Services, Impact Investing, Information Technology, Property Management, Real Estate, SaaS, Social Impact, Software

businessDescription: Livup provides an organization tool that makes living in shared apartments easier.

businessDescription: CoreLedger is a blockchain infrastructure company building tools and resources for businesses of all sizes, provider specializing in startup, SME, and enterprise-grade solutions, whether you’re looking to quickly build a proof-of-concept, or develop an enterprise-grade application.

name: Arbidex
businessDescription: Integrated crypto trading platform

name: vestr
businessDescription: We provide an easy-to-integrate platform that automates the management of your actively managed investment products throughout their lifecycle. So you can focus on your core talents, our configurable software engine manages everything from portfolio rebalancing to investor reporting and audit trails. Vestr's leadership team has vast expertise in leading fintech and technology firms. Because of our expertise, we are able to provide the best software for AMC issuers.
tags: Asset Management, Finance, Financial Services, SaaS

name: Anaveon
businessDescription: Anaveon is a developing IL-2 complexes which selectively promote effector T cell functions.  Our compounds act as effective immune adjuvants with a broad therapeutic window and marked preclinical efficacy against cancer either as monotherapy or in combination with other therapies.

name: yes.com
businessDescription:
Yes.com is a trusted network that connects banks with their clients. Users can use yes® to log in to third-party providers or pay for contracts using their online banking login without having to open a new account. Yes® works with every bank right out of the box. Integration is not required, however, it is more enjoyable.
Yes® enables participating banks to consolidate rather than lose the customer interface in the active bank model, and it also creates a new market for value-added goods.
tags: Banking, E-Commerce, FinTech, Internet, Mobile Payments, Venture Capital

name: Parashift
businessDescription: Parashift built a software with artificial intelligence to handle documents. Unlike its competitors, Parashift offers 100% correct extraction of data from paper documents. Further, they shifting paradigms how documents are handled in future. After 2 years of science basic research with PhD in mathematics, Engineers etc. they launched this year their platform.
longBusinessDescription:
Today, many companies are still processing most of their daily document inflow manually. This is not only very time consuming and expensive, but not necessary any-more.
Parashift provides companies sophisticated solutions based on machine learning technologies for their individual needs. Empowered by these technologies, companies benefit from time and cost reduction by up to 80% related to document management processes.
In the process of getting product-market fit, Parashift has built a proprietary artificial intelligence data extraction engine that enables customers to send random, unprepared receipts and invoices to a developed platform which then undergoes a quality enhancement before the engine makes document classifications and full data extractions with implemented confidence checks. Customers then have the optionality to do either a self-validation process on low confidence documents or make us of Parashift’s offer to validate GDPR compliant results, using a combination of technological and human measures.
tags: saas, IT, artificial intelligence, software, documents

name: Hutter Products
businessDescription:
Hutter Products verwendet recycelten Plastik, um nachhaltige Konsumgüter zu entwickeln und herzustellen, die auf die Kreislaufwirtschaft zugeschnitten sind. Reduzieren, wiederverwenden und recyceln ist unser Ziel.

Mit dem Maximum an recyceltem Material und einem optimalen Design streben wir eine gesündere Zukunft für Konsumgüter an.

Hutter Products: For a Sustainable Future!
tags: Circular Economy, Recycled Products, Sustainable Products

name: Turicode
businessDescription: Turicode is a SaaS provider in the field of document processing solutions, based on machine learning and deep learning. Turicode has developed a software solution which creates new possibilities of information extraction
tags: artificial intelligence, machine learning, document management

name: Enterprise Bot
businessDescription: Powering the future in Hyperautomation with AI-powered chat and e-mail bots that improve CX and enterprise efficiency
longBusinessDescription: Enterprise Bot provides cost-effective, AI-powered automation solutions to transform customer interaction for global enterprises. Their novel digital interaction tools like chatbots, email bots, and voice bots offer instant, multi-channel support to the customer in their language so that they don't have to put up with the inconvenience of staying on call for minutes or listen to robotic voices by pressing unhelpful IVR numbers.
tags: AI conversational Chatbots, Customer service, Customer Experience

name: sublimd
businessDescription: Award-winning medical software platform to radically reduce paperwork, enhance treatment outcome and revolutionize clinical research.
longBusinessDescription: sublimd was founded in 2016 in the canton of Zug, Switzerland, by three physicians and a software engineer. The company develops an award-winning medical software platform to dramatically reduce paperwork, enhance treatment outcome and revolutionize clinical research. The sublimd Suite is offered for three areas of application: The Emergency Room Suite for emergency rooms, the Clinic Suite for clinics and the Practice Suite for medical practices. In 2017, sublimd has been awarded by the Seedhopper Summer Prize, the Swiss Quality Award and the Audience Award of Deine gesunde Arzt-Idee. In 2018, sublimd has won the Zuger JungUnternehmer Preis and the IHK Startup Slam at the European Health Congress Munich.

name: Veezoo
businessDescription:
Veezoo empowers individuals at every level of the organisation to make real-time, data-driven decisions that move the organization forward.

Powered by a highly configurable, industry-leading AI data backend and an easy-to-use chat interface, Veezoo replaces traditionally inefficient drag-and-drop analytics with an intuitive, conversational interface so that anyone can discover actionable insights in seconds - no coding required!
tags: Business Intelligence, Insights, Software, SaaS, Data Analytics

businessDescription: PriceHubble was founded to bring transparency into real estate markets globally. We provide insights & solutions to our clients, allowing them to take smarter real estate decisions and enabling them to boost critical performance metrics in their business (e.g. client conversion, retention or rental yield). Since then, PriceHubble has gathered a unique team of data scientists, engineers and seasoned entrepreneurs to provide its clients the most advanced real estate insights, seamlessly integrated into their daily business processes.

name: Sqooba
businessDescription: Sqooba is a Swiss provider of big data analytics solutions.

name: Yamo
businessDescription: Yamo is on a mission to give parents healthier and easy food choices for their children. Its products are available online via a direct to consumer subscription model and through grocery stores. The latter includes Coop in Switzerland and select Edeka and Rewe stores in Germany.
tags: Baby, Children, E-Commerce ,Food and Beverage, Nutrition

name: Daedalean
businessDescription: Daedalean is building autonomous piloting software systems for civil aircraft of today and advanced aerial mobility of tomorrow. The company has 40+ people, including 8 PhDs and 7 pilots, with expertise from the fields of machine learning, robotics, computer vision, path planning as well as aviation-grade software-engineering and certification. We have offices in Zürich, Switzerland and Minsk, Belarus.
tags: autonomous & sensor tech, big data, computer vision

name: Enterprise Bot
businessDescription: Enterprise Bot provide banks with a powerful AI-powered customer relationship tool to enhance customer experience. The multi platform messenger takes care of a wide range of customer needs and queries for call centers reducing costs by 85% and wait time by 90-95%.

name: Klarys
businessDescription:
Klarys has built an e-procurement platform to address the specific issues of Fresh Food buyers.

What will you find in your platform?
- A standardised purchasing data reference base: Klarys assists your suppliers individually to structure and centralise their offer. 
- An intuitive purchasing interface: allowing you to access your suppliers' stocks directly, compare prices and digitalise your invoices. 
- Reliable data: Klarys generates dashboards from your purchasing and sales data to help you better monitor your business.
- Key tools to meet the needs of your team: invoicing, traceability, sustainability.
Our solution is "universal" (interoperable): designed to fit in with existing systems and applications via API, EDI). Data is centralised in a single source and tasks are automated.

Our customers all testify to the productivity gains, competitiveness and responsiveness that our solution offers them. By digitising their transactions and automating tasks that have no human added value, they have been able to refocus on their core business, improve their supplier relations and get more reliable data.
tags: Food and Beverage, Food Processing ,Marketplace, Seafood

name: DYDON AI
businessDescription:
DYDON AI is a Swiss company offering transparent and flexible AI solutions for Sustainable Finance (Fintech), Insurtech and Medtech.

The Sustainable Finance AI Suite provides a fast, easy, traceable and transparent assessment of all the necessary criteria to rank and analyse the sustainability level concerning ESG, EU Taxonomy and Supply Chain Risk.

The core technology of our AI Suite is based on Natural Language Processing (NLP), taxonomies, and on NeuroFuzzy logic, integrated with other models. Based on a solid technology, Dydon AI can build further develop functionalities for your specific company needs.

The leading idea of Dydon AI’s platform is its modularity. The idea behind it is to avoid siloed AI Suites, creating instead one unique platform allowing a step-by-step realisation and integration of individual AI solutions for different topics (including integration of existing third-party AI models) under one unifying system umbrella. This will avoid any future problems having to deal with huge numbers of individual and siloed AI solutions.

The platform offers:

- a non-siloed approach to AI: trainable for multiple topics (e.g. ESG Rating, Continuous Process Quality/Efficiency Ratings, Supplier Monitoring, Topic Filters, Asset Monitoring, EU Taxonomy, Risk & Compliance management etc.)
- easy usage by non-AI experts
- explainable AI results for business leaders
- staying always up to date in terms of regulatory changes: any regulatory change is going to be updated centrally within the platform
- rapid implementation
tags: artificial intelligence, fintech, sustainable finance, legaltech

name: Noble Transfer
businessDescription: Noble Transfer is offering private airport transfer, & shuttle services with professional chauffeurs in Switzerland and across Europe at affordable rates.
longBusinessDescription:
Welcome to Noble Transfer - A leading online private passenger transfer company based in Switzerland and operated across Europe including Austria, Germany, Spain, Italy, UK & France offering safe, comfortable and luxury Mercedes Limousine, Business Class Transfer with professional chauffeur to clients with utmost affordability and satisfaction globally. With professional and multilingual chauffeurs who are well-trained & highly dedicated, we are ensuring the safe, stress-free and relaxed pick-up and drop-off facility throughout the way. Just tell us your plans and we make a customized itinerary for your convenience with a wide range of luxury fleets.

name: Xoop
businessDescription:
Xoop builds innovative digital platforms to inform and entertain, especially on top of social networks, and strives to become a technology leader in the field.
Xoop was founded by key people of the sector and backed by angel investors with deep insights about the industry. Xoop is based in Switzerland and Germany.

name: DeepCode
businessDescription: We automatically learn from millions of available software programs and use this knowledge to make key suggestions on how to improve your code. DeepCode empower software developers to be efficient and deliver more reliable code through AI code-review suggestions learned from BigCode. Our mission at DeepCode is to change the way we create programs by using powerful artificial intelligence and machine learning techniques.

name: Intento
businessDescription: Intento has developed an easy-to-use, effective solution to help severely paralyzed stroke patients recover motor function in upper limbs. Even several years after the stroke. Their solution is based on functional electrical stimulation and does not require any prior knowledge on electrode placement or involve complicated steps to configure the system, as opposed to other solutions on the market.

longBusinessDescription:
Picterra was created in 2016 by Frank de Morsier and Pierrick Poulenas in Lausanne, Switzerland. Unlike many competitors, the vision of Picterra is to make the exploitation and use of Earth observation imagery accessible to all, not just data scientists and developers, as this is one of the key resources of our century.
Picterra is an AI-based SaaS platform which allows to interactively create a personalized AI detecting, localizing and counting any objects from satellite and aerial imagery, all in just a few clicks. Above all, Picterra is a community of users who pool their expertise and their vision of the world to collectively create a common library of deep learning models.
With daily images from satellites and the drones being commoditized, the observation of our Earth surface has reached an unprecedented level. Picterra tracks deforestation over thousands of square kilometers of protected forests and anyone can start localizing certain agricultural fields or fallen trees, as well as counting crops or animals on Earth observation images.
Picterras goal is to democratize the access to Earth observation and machine learning and eventually provide a new source of information to help Humanity make better-informed decisions to protect our global ecosystem.

name: Jelurida Swiss
businessDescription:
Blockchain-based technologies are revolutionizing the world as they are applied to new and existing business models. Jelurida is a pioneer blockchain software company that enables enterprises to quickly adapt the blockchain technology using the Nxt and Ardor technologies. 
The Nxt blockchain is available for public and private use, with a five-year development history, proven stability, a massive community, and a well established proof-of-stake model. Moreover, with its last launch, with the Ardor blockchain-as-a-service platform, oriented to make the adoption even easier, Jelurida takes a highly competitive place in the blockchain landscape. 
Some of the solutions that companies can build on Nxt and Ardor are a monetary system (i.e., for creating social coins), an asset exchange, a data cloud to manage digital storage, a voting system, a system to make smart and conditioned (phasing) transactions, and more.
longBusinessDescription:
One of the main bottlenecks of existing smart contract technology is that it requires every node in the blockchain to process every contract to reach the same state. But is this really necessary?
In Ardor, we implemented a different approach which is more flexible and scalable. Instead of requiring every node to process every contract invocation, we ask only the parties interested in the contract to process it and verify that they reach the same state.
With this approach, the contract code itself is a simple Java class uploaded to the blockchain and therefore digitally signed and time stamped. However, the execution of the contract is only performed by nodes who selected to run the ContractRunner addon.
The input to the contract is typically a transaction with an attached message, which identifies the contract to execute, and supplies optional parameters. The output of the contract are one or more transactions submitted to the network to update the blockchain state. The transactions submitted by the contract are normal transactions which have to comply with all the existing protocol rules.
In other words, the lightweight contract, is Java code which implements a certain interface, stored on the blockchain. The contract code is executed by anyone who wants to run it, not by every node, and is triggered by a blockchain transaction (or by each new block). The result of the calculation made by the contract is submitted as one or more normal transactions of any type supported by Ardor.
What can it be used for? Lightweight contracts provide essentially everything Ethereum smart contracts are used for, integrated with everything Ardor already provides out of the box. Such as automation of repetitive tasks, Financial calculations, Predictable random numbers, Oracles to register information from external sources, and more. All this is integrated with the existing built in Ardor Coin Exchange, Asset Exchange, Voting Tools, Marketplace, Account Properties, Messages, etc. This provides a powerful tool for developing decentralized applications by relying on existing built in API features.
But, how do we make sure that whoever executes the smart contract does not cheat? Since the Java class file is stored on the blockchain, anyone interested can execute the same contract based on the same input, either in production mode, in order to submit the output as a transaction or in approval mode to verify that a transaction submitted by a contract indeed followed the correct calculations.

name: Synple Chem
businessDescription:
Synple was founded in 2016, as a spin-off from ETH in Zürich, with the aim of providing easy to use, safe, efficiency-enhancing organic synthesis solutions that help accelerate discovery research. Since then, the company has developed two generations of its innovative capsule-based synthesis instrument and a wide range of reaction applications and cartridges.

Today, its growing, global customer base has readily adopted the technology in their synthetic laboratories.

For more information on Synple Chem, please visit the website https://synplechem.com
longBusinessDescription:
The idea for Synple started back in 2015. At the time most of us were still working in the Bode group at ETH, where we had just launched the SnAP reagents commercially. We were getting a lot of feedback about how powerful the SnAP method was but it was clear that some people were uncomfortable handling the tin and that there was some variability in the results depending on how experienced the chemist was with SnAP chemistry and what their source of reagents was. During one of our meetings we discussed how great it would be if we could encapsulate all the reagents needed for the reaction and then have an automated machine in which one could simply add the cartridge and press go. Thus our “coffee machine for chemistry” concept was born.
Benedikt started the development of the machine during the last year of his PhD and as a small team we worked to develop the optimized reaction sequences and reagent cartridges that would enable the machine to carry out not only the reaction but also the work-up and purification in a fully automated manner. Following development of the basic proof of concept, we founded Synple Chem and subsequently secured seed investment that enabled us to produce and test a beta version of our technology with customers across pharma, biotechs, CROs and academia.
Since completion of the pilot phase we have launched a new version of the machine and have added many more reaction class to the technologies capabilities. Today we have customers across Europe, the US and Asia and we continue, as a relatively small team, to develop new reaction classes and expand the applicability of the machine. Our goal is to provide easy to use, safe, efficiency-enhancing organic synthesis solutions to accelerate discovery research

Bancor uses a novel token "Connector" approach to enable formulaic price computation and continuous liquidity for all compliant tokens without the necessity for two parties to match in an exchange. Smart TokensTM connect to build token liquidity networks, allowing for the growth of user-generated cryptocurrencies. Please visit the website and read the Bancor ProtocolTM Whitepaper for more information.

name: SwissDeCode
businessDescription: We are driven by our vision of a safe food supply chain, where companies can trust the quality of products and food is safe to consume. businessDescription: SatSure is working towards supporting financial services in the agricultural sector.

name: InterAx Biotech
businessDescription: InterAx combines machine learning, mathematical modeling of cellular processes, and experimental methods derived from more than 10 years of fundamental research to generate high-efficacy leads for a given GPCR target. We decipher drug effects on cellular signaling – one of the least understood aspects of biology, and a major point of failure for new medicines. We provide unique tools for discovery and optimization of GPCR drug candidates.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Bioinformatics, Biopharma, Biotechnology, Information Technology, Machine Learning

name: ImmuProbe
businessDescription: ImmuProbe develops a protein quantification system, which is characterized by both an outstanding performance at very small sample volumes as well as low acquisition and consumable costs. We designed an approach to outmatching state-of-the-art technology in terms of usability, speed, and customisability: the BoxProbe. With this system, we intend to overcome the current limitations in research studies relying on small laboratory animals, resulting in improved quality of obtained data and drastically decreasing the number of animals needed, allowing scientists to efficiently apply the principles of the three Rs (replace, refine, reduce) of animal welfare.

name: GuestReady
businessDescription:
GuestReady is a platform for real estate management with a focus on short-term rentals. GuestReady is a leading property technology company with a focus on short-term and mid-term rental management.

We launched operations in 2016 and are presently active in over 30 cities around the world, including cities such as Paris, London, Lisbon, and Dubai.

name: Foxstone
businessDescription:
Foxstone is a market leader in Swiss Real Estate Crowdfunding. It was founded by real estate professionals with the goal of democratizing the market by allowing every investor to acquire a piece of Swiss residential real estate.

Foxstone connects, on the one hand, Swiss citizens by providing access to the best asset class available on the market, which was previously only available to professionals and the wealthy, and on the other hand, hand-picked real estate entrepreneurs who benefit from exposure to a large investor network through its online platform.
Foxstone provides a comprehensive web-based platform that covers the complete deal process, saving time and paperwork for both parties and making the whole journey simple, cost-effective, and time-efficient.

Foxstone is democratizing the gaming industry.

name: GliaPharm
businessDescription:
GliaPharm is a biotechnology business established in Switzerland that focuses on neurological and mental illnesses.

In pathological settings, GliaPharm's novel treatment approach is to target glial cells, the'support cells' of neurons, to maintain and boost brain metabolism. Our goal is to establish a premier biotechnology firm focused on glia-mediated pathways as neuroprotection and cognitive function maintenance agents.

name: Hemotune
businessDescription:
We are a medical device start-up based out of ETH Zurich that is passionate about inventing life-saving solutions.
Our goal is to create a game-changing medical gadget to address the most pressing healthcare challenges. We translate the most promising research into clinics and give patients access to scientific advancement as quickly as feasible by focusing on their needs. We are influencing the future of medicine as pioneers by making brave decisions. We'll start by looking for an effective treatment for patients with sepsis, a deadly illness that kills millions of people every year.
tags: Biotechnology, Health Care, Life Science, Medical Device, Therapeutics

name: Innoview
businessDescription: The objective of Innoview is to expand and monetize aesthetically appealing document security technologies.

businessDescription: LIGENTEC is a B2B firm that makes Photonic Integrated Circuits (PIC) for customers in high-tech fields like artificial intelligence, quantum technologies, LiDAR, and biosensors. The all-nitride-core technology is commercialised by LIGENTEC. LIGENTEC's all-nitride-core technology enables clients to design devices for the fourth industrial revolution. Our customers gain a clear roadmap to volume production while acquiring modest numbers of wafers with the performance, quick turn around, and high yield necessary at the proof of concept stage.

name: MachIQ Software
businessDescription:

Our Software as a Service (SaaS) helps machine builders to improve their customer experience in after-sales services, including spare parts sales, technical support, field-services, and Industry 4.0 services powered by IoT. Their manufacturing customers, on the other hand, benefit from improved industrial asset performance at lower costs, as well as improved spare parts management, equipment maintenance activities, and more.
MachIQ is a software programme designed for machine builders.
Improve the after-sales service experience for customers. Industry 4.0 will cause huge changes in business models, similar to what Uber has done in the transportation industry.

Established in 2016 through the acquisition of Bayer Diabetes Care by PHC Holdings (formerly known as Panasonic Healthcare Holdings), Ascensia Diabetes Care is a global company entirely dedicated to improving the health and lives of people with diabetes.

name: modum
businessDescription:

name: MaxWell Biosystems
businessDescription: MaxWell Biosystems develops technologies to boost basic neuroscience research and speed up the development of preclinical drugs. MaxOne, an electrophysiological platform for recording and activating electrogenic cells in vitro, is one of the company's products. With 26,400 electrodes, 1024 low-noise readout channels, and 32 stimulation channels, it's a CMOS-based high-density microelectrode array. It facilitates phenotypic screening and pharmacological toxicity/efficacy testing by collecting single cell and network characteristics.

name: Olyseum
businessDescription:
Carlos Grenoir, a famous computer scientist and neuroscientist, and Kevin Mitnick, a world-known computer security expert, established Olyseum. With former FC Barcelona players Carles Puyol and Iván de la Pea, they formed Olyseum.
Olyseum's purpose-built rewards ecosystem allows fans to interact with entertainment leaders, sports stars, fashion icons, and global trailblazers, which is a paradigm shift in the world of fan interaction.
Olyseum's star roster already includes Olyseum co-founders Carles Puyol and Andrés Iniesta, as well as MotoGP great Jorge Martn, motorcycling icon Toni Bou, and 5-star Michelin chef Eneko Atxa, all of whom have hundreds of millions of social media followers.

All types of skin issues, such as rash, eczema, birthmarks, and others, can be evaluated using OnlineDoctor.

It provides sophisticated software tools that help in applying for a visa with only a few clicks. It offers a personal, fast, and reliable service with Swiss quality. Our cloud-based 3DXTM Blade Platform is at the heart of our digital end-to-end process, bringing all aspects of rotor blade inspection together in one place. It provides customers with a totally transparent picture of the whole fleet's blade health condition, as well as the ability to record visual blade data using our fully autonomous drones, processes the images, and generate highly configurable reports at the touch of a button.

name: Batmaid

Batmaid.com is the 1st on-demand home cleaning platform in Switzerland and Luxembourg.

In a few clicks, users can book a certified, background-checked, declared and insured home cleaner for just once or with a frequency. Batmaid aims at combining the full digitization of the cleaning experience with a hotel-like customer service and cleaning quality.

Batmaid is neither the employer nor using self-employed workers. Batmaid turns its clients into the employers of the maids by providing automated trust service to declare every single employment relationship.

name: Zippsafe
businessDescription:
Zippsafe AG is a technology company founded in 2015 and a provider of highly space-efficient storage solutions. The company's core competence lies in the development, manufacture and installation of lockable lock bags for changing rooms and for public spaces. 

Development, marketing and sales as well as administrative activities are managed at the headquarters in Glattbrugg, Zurich. Manufacturing takes place via a number of selected production partners, and final assembly takes place in the specially built subsidiary Zippsafe Kft. In Hungary. 

With a focus on continuous innovation and simplicity, Zippsafe sets new standards in the field of flexible, textile storage solutions. Since winning the renowned Venture Kick Prize in 2016, orders from an international clientele from Switzerland, France, Latvia and the USA have been processed.

In addition, Zippsafe aims to further develop its products in the software area in particular, with major releases around the topic of Smart Locker Management expected this year.

name: High Performance Battery
businessDescription: Solid state battery
longBusinessDescription:
High Performance Battery specializes in the research and development of high-tech batteries. 
By using the solid-state electrolyte developed by us, the capacity of our battery will remain almost constant over its lifetime. No matter how heavy the battery is used. Our battery technology is safe because our electrolyte is non-flammable and the battery is non-explosive. No critical raw materials are needed for production. This also improves the environmental balance by more than half compared to conventional lithium-ion batteries.
tags: Storage, Battery, Cleantech, Automobile, Eco Friendly

longBusinessDescription:
Entnest is an invite-only digital platform to connect, support and enable sustainable innovation within and across silos, locally and globally. We combine a wide spectrum of tools under the same platform, acting as a "virtual Swiss army knife" for the entrepreneurship ecosystem.
Our purpose is to improve the success rate and impact of innovation. We work with entrepreneurs, ventures and support organizations (coworking, incubators, accelerators, VCs, educational institutes, governments, associations, NGOs, corporates and more).

name: KOSMA

Its four key modules - Budgeting, Financing, Cashflow and Cost Control - make your film production cost management more easy, precise and efficient. Just like it should be on the 21st century.

name: Gamaya

name: Biowatch
businessDescription: Biowatch is a user-friendly wrist veins biometric reader that functions as a security solution for mobile payment protection and smart device interaction. Users can access the app for enrolling their vein pattern and selecting applications and devices that needs to be connected to their Biowatch, wear their BioWatch and activate it by matching their vein pattern with their enrolled reference, get PKI encrypted user code transmitted from their Biowatch, and start opening doors without the use of keys and passwords.

name: Battrion
businessDescription: Battrion is a Swiss spin-off of ETH Zurich and works closely with the Laboratory for Nanoelectronics at ETH. Battrion develops and markets innovative fabrication technologies for lithium ion batteries aimed at increasing the charging speed of high energy density cells. By innovating on a single step in the industrial battery manufacturing processes, our patented Battrion technology improves the microstructure of the negative electrode, which constitutes the bottleneck for fast charging. The Battrion technology platform allows cell manufacturers to meet the growing performance, cost and safety requirements.

name: Foldercrate

longBusinessDescription: Foldercrate combines standard online services like email, cloud storage, calendar, notes, friend list and chat in a single service. Offering more freedom, security and privacy to B2C and B2B customers Foldercrate offers a complete package where you can just use the service without the need to integrate countless different services from different providers.

According to the World Health Organization, two thirds of the global population still have no access to this vital diagnostic technology. Meanwhile, countries that already have access to radiology systems have seen prices rise drastically, and need to bring healthcare costs under control. Pristem is developing an “all-in-one” radiology system, which it expects to commercialise within the next two years. The system will be high-tech, user-friendly, economical, and durable – making radiology accessible even in remote areas, particularly in low- and middle-income countries.

As a fast-growing advertising platform we partner with national and international brands in the IT, retail and FMCG sectors and seek to continuously grow these and new cooperations to ensure unique value to both, our users and business partners.

SchoolApply help students from anywhere in the world connect with schools that best match their needs and potential.

Bonsai has refined a versatile hardware and software platform over the years. The Bonsai platform has been applied also to other fields, like motion analysis for sports and rehabilitation and impact research.

name: M.G. Creations
businessDescription: M.G. Creations is a manufacturer, supplier, and exporter of home furnishing products. We produce top-in-class home decor products at our Indian factory. Our product portfolio includes cotton, woolen, and jute rugs, carpets, cushion covers, area rugs, kitchen towels, tea towels, dish towels, kitchen linens, poufs, ottomans, braided rugs, round rugs, bath mats, bath rugs, etc. Our website contains a specially curated portfolio of best quality home furnishing products. We are a good-weave certified rugs company. Our motto is to be on track for sustainable growth while caring for our employees and customers.
longBusinessDescription:
Our family started manufacturing rugs in 1988 but did not try to expand to the export market. We foray into the export market in 2014 when the co-founder Dr. S.S Nandal joined the family business after retirement from Government Service. Since then, we have never looked back and are on our way to continuous growth. 
Our goal is to maintain growth with sustainability. We expect to grow fourfold in the next four to five years. We are a company that focuses on staff betterment, customer satisfaction, and customer retention. In accordance with our current growth rate and foray into new product categories, we also expect to become a complete home furnishing Solution Company in the near future.
Our Management team consists of three people. First is Dr. Sumer Singh Nandal, retired Deputy Director from the Ministry of youth affairs, Department of sports, Government of Haryana, India. Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) in Public Administration (Specialization in Sports Administration ) 1988. Second is Dr. Shakuntala nandal, Ph.D. in Home science, a retired Associate professor from the education department and now a chief designer in M.G. Creations. Our third Co-founder, Sh. Kuldeep Singh is a textile manufacturing veteran and has 40 years of experience in the home furnishing industry.
The innovative designs of carpets, cushions, and other products are our main sources that are creating disruption in the industry. Our in-house designing team always comes up with spectacular and eye-catching designs, which are completely new in the market, and therefore, we have now become a trendsetter in our sector.  
X-factor lies in the management of the manufacturing process. The real culprit of the high manufacturing costs of handmade items is the wastage of raw materials in production. We have a strict policy on zero-waste production methods. All the by-products of export-order products are used to manufacture cushion fillers for the local market. This X-factor helps us in bringing down production costs by up to 10 percent in comparison to other manufacturers.
The concept and foundation of our organization are the expertise we have gained and the unique techniques we have formulated since 1988 in manufacturing handmade home furnishing products. Our export-oriented startup, M.G. Creations, was launched in 2014, and since then, we have exported home furnishing products to Europe, North America, South America, and Asia.
Our main potential customers are B2B business owners who deal in home furnishing products. Foreign clients can buy from us directly without any middleman involvement and shipment and documentation are handled by our expert team. Clients or buyers can select products on our website and send inquiries directly.

name: Ava
businessDescription: Ava makes it easy to gain a profound and accurate understanding of your cycle and healthempowering you to make informed choices for your life. Because we believe every woman deserves greater control over her wellbeing, and the tools to maximize her physical and emotional potential.

name: WP MLM Software
businessDescription: WP MLM Software Plugin is an MLM WordPress Plugin that transforms WordPress websites into a robust and complete MLM management hub. With this plugin, MLM marketers and professionals can efficiently manage their MLM accounts, track commissions, compensations, and more.
longBusinessDescription: WP MLM Software Plugin can be customized to better suit specific MLM plans and schemes. It is a user-friendly tool that users can scale effortlessly when required and boasts an array of compelling features to make MLM management and operations a breeze. On top of that, WP MLM Software Plugin is packed with analytics functionality that enables users to observe their income and expenses and analyze reports. Users can create a visualization of their MLM Tree to get a clear picture of their plans, downlines, recruit, commissions, and more.

name: SecurionPay
businessDescription: SecurionPay is a payment platform for online and mobile card payments. It is well-known for its extremely simple integration and versatile APIs that enable merchants to create any payment scenario based on their setup, programming language, use cases, and more. Merchants can test their payment settings before they start accepting real transactions, thanks to the sandbox mode.
longBusinessDescription:
The Swiss-based payment platform offers solutions for single payments, as well as recurring ones. Merchants can choose from a variety of conversion-boosting features that enhance the user experience. These are, for instance, One-click payments, Cross-sales, Remember me option. Online businesses that want to sell globally can accept payments in 160 currencies through a Checkout translated into 23 languages.
Limitless integration possibilities and flexibility on every step of the payment process lead to a higher conversion rate and reduced number of abandoned carts. The entire checkout process is designed with online consumers needs in mind.
SecurionPay puts a strong focus not only on conversion and user experience but also on security. As a PCI level 1 company, it provides a set of effective anti-fraud tools, AI-based infrastructure to fight fraud actively, machine learning solutions, blacklisting, non-invasive 3D Secure authentication that minimizes chargeback ratio without hindering conversion, and more.
Furthermore, SecurionPay provides transparent pricing that you can find on its website. The pricing depends on a business model, like following:
* 2.95% + 0.25 Euro per successful transaction for Regular merchants
* 4.9% + 0.35 Euro per transaction for High-risk merchants
Please note that SecurionPay works with companies that are incorporated in Europe. You can find more information about the countries they operate in and supported businesses on their website.

name: Largo
businessDescription: We make the data-driven movie-making accessible to the market through our high level film understanding technologies. Largo has developed data-driven intelligence, which can be introduced much earlier in the life of a film project, right from script choice and development, through filming, post-production and theatrical release. Largo empowers production companies with data-enhanced ROI uplift and reduction of risk.

businessDescription: Storyline combines Google mail, calendar and docs in one app and displays your items in a chronological order. It helps you organise your day and tasks.

businessDescription:

KiWi empowers micro-merchants through access to adapted digital technology, contributing to a fair and competitive market. With their KiWi app, merchants can accept card and mobile payments, get access to microcredit, and make more money by selling additional KiWi services and products.

name: Lunaphore
businessDescription:

With our platform, a test can be performed in less than 5min, v.s. 2-8h using other technologies. In addition, clinical trials have demonstrated 90% more accurate results when testing samples using our platform than with techniques currently used in hospitals.

name: Astrocast

name: Cellestia
businessDescription: Clinical stage biopharma company active in the field of precision oncology.
longBusinessDescription: Cellestia is giving hope to cancer patients who have no other treatment or therapy options by developing innovative targeted therapies. Our drug discovery platform is built on a unique mode of action of targeting protein-protein interactions (PPI) with small molecules. Together with companion diagnostics, Cellestia provides a first-in-class solution for NOTCH-driven cancers. Our clinical candidate drug CB-103 is targeting orphan cancers such as cancer of the salivary gland (adenoid cystic carcinoma) and a subtype of childhood leukaemia. At the same time, we are continuing to expand our portfolio through (i) targeting large cancer indications with CB-103, such as breast cancer, and (ii) developing novel PPI inhibitors for additionnal oncology indications. Cellestia is a privately-owned clinical-stage biopharma company (phase I) led by an experienced team of scientists, drug developers and business professionals.
tags: Pharmaceuticals, Biopharma, health tech, cellestia, Basel

name: ConsenSys
businessDescription: ConsenSys is the most well-known Ethereum software firm. Our product package, which includes Infura, Quorum, Truffle, Codefi, MetaMask, and Diligence, serves millions of users, handles billions of dollars in digital assets, and enables billions of blockchain-based queries for our clients. Ethereum is the world's largest programmable blockchain, with the largest developer community and DeFi activity. We are constructing the digital economy of the future on this trusted, open source foundation.

name: Equippo.com
businessDescription:
Equippo: The Most Convenient Way to Purchase Used Equipment

businessDescription:

We are advancing our lead drug candidate CRD1 under orphan drug designation for the treatment of neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorders (NMO) and myasthenia gravis (MG)
At Chord Therapeutics, we are dedicated to changing the lives of patients affected by rare diseases that often have no or only limited treatment options.
We are convinced that cladribine’s demonstrated safety and powerful, well-understood pharmacology can provide benefit in a variety of rare disorders and lead to de-risked treatment innovation.

More information will be released in the coming months.
In the meantime, I'd like to express my gratitude for everything you've done.

PROGNOSIX is a unique method that mixes people and technology.

Our one-stop technology platform leverages a single FIX API to enable traditional and crypto native clients to trade digital and traditional assets.
tags: Asset Management, Banking, Bitcoin, Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, FinTech, Software, Trading Platform

name: ABCDx
businessDescription: ABCDx is a company headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland that discovers and develops diagnostic tools transforming care for patients with brain injuries. ABCDx’s devices help the healthcare professionals in the triage, diagnosis and treatment decision process at the point of care for patients presenting with potential brain injury from stroke and trauma to post-injury complications and patient outcome. ABCDx is pioneering the ability to decode the chemical messages of the brain (brain biomarkers) so that brain injury can be detected in a drop of blood from a finger prick, allowing the diagnosis at the admission of the emergency department, before hospitalization or even directly on the field where the injury occurred.

name: Stealth Key
businessDescription:
WE RESTORE THE SAFETY OF KEYS.
With a smartphone and a low-cost 3D printer, anyone can replicate keys today. We created the world's safest mechanical key by concealing all security codes on the inside of the key, making it undetectable to cameras and scanners. Security firms collaborate with us to address the hazards of 3D key cloning so that they may provide truly secure solutions to their clients.
Join forces with us:
- Become a Reseller - Add Stealth Technology to your high-security products.
- Use Stealth Technology to safeguard your assets.

name: Xsensio
businessDescription:
Xsensio creates the Lab-on-SkinTM sensing technology, which detects biochemical data at the skin's surface in real time, offering unprecedented real-time information on our health and wellness in an easy and non-invasive manner.
The Xsensio Lab-on-SkinTM sensing chip is based on a one-of-a-kind, ultra-miniaturized sensing platform created at the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology's Nanolab. Our sensing platform opens up a whole new world of possibilities in continuous health monitoring by utilising semiconductor characteristics.
tags: Health Care, Mobile, Sensor, Wearables, Wellness

name: BRD
businessDescription: BRD designs develop and market financial software. It's believed that all people have the right to directly own their wealth. Our core wallet technology is, and will always be, open-source and free. We invite anyone to use our code according to the terms of the MIT open-source license.

name: Once
businessDescription:
Once is the leader in mobile serious dating, having launched in October 2015 with the goal of providing singles with a better opportunity to meet someone properly. Once prioritises quality over quantity by presenting you with the ideal matches every day at noon!
Once offering significant connections in a world of endless swipes, now gives meaningful matches to make online dating magical once more.
Every day, its algorithm considers tastes, dating preferences, and previous matches to offer better profiles.
Once has also integrated a rating feature for users to rate their dates, making dating better and safer for everyone. With over 10 million users in seven countries and $9 million raised to date, Once has also integrated a rating feature for users to rate their dates, making dating better and safer for everyone.

Gamaya agriculture analytics enhances production efficiency and risk management by supporting optimal decision making, including the use of chemicals and fertilisers, leading in greater and higher yields while reducing environmental impact.

name: Verity
businessDescription:
Verity is a prominent provider of drone failsafe technology and a global leader in autonomous indoor drone systems.
Verity's drones have flown over 250,000 autonomous flights securely over humans in over 100 sites in 20 countries since its inception in 2014.
Verity's solutions automate inventory management, monitoring, and inspection duties in the logistics and warehousing industries, giving clients like IKEA and DSV meaningful insights into their daily operations. Verity's technologies are used in the live events industry to produce amazing moments for audiences all over the world, including stunning light shows for clients like Cirque du Soleil and Madison Square Garden, as well as global tours by famous musicians like Metallica, Drake, and Céline Dion.

Global Jobcoin will become the de facto payment method on all platforms as the organisation grows its operations globally. Jobstoday is also cooperating with other job sites to enable Global Jobcoin integration on their platforms. Sunny Look Media LLC, a registered Swiss company since 2014 in Wollerau, Canton of Schwyz, is the creator of the Global Jobcoin and Jobstoday Platforms.

name: GotCourts

Connecting players and fostering their enthusiasm for the game

It's the first platform to bring together all of a player's demands in one spot. GotCourts is your "virtual worldwide club" for finding a partner or coach, scheduling a court nearby, fighting for a spot in our leaderboards, and tracking your progress. We provide a robust club administration system and a platform to engage with the community for court facilities and clubs.

name: Goodwall

name: Histide
businessDescription: Histide is a biotech intellectual property platform company pioneering a new class of non-mutagenic extracellular therapeutic agents called Cell Recoding Moleculesâ„¢ (CRMs). This innovative platform builds on Histideâ€™s expertise in the mechanisms underlying the cellâ€™s microenvironmental sensing and signal transduction processes. The CRMs promote and stimulate the cellâ€™s natural capacities to redirect its own fate by integrating accurate extracellular signals. This is at the heart of Histideâ€™s groundbreaking approach of addressing diseases called Recoding Therapeuticsâ„¢, that goes beyond traditional cell, gene or RNA based therapies. Histide has a technological breakthrough with vast indication spectra of pharmaceuticals, medical devices and medical cosmetics. Their mission : Establish Cell Recoding Molecules (CRMs) as new class of therapeutic solutions. Their vision : To unlock the potential of Recoding Therapeutics by establishing an ecosystem of teams and partners, all committed to providing enhanced therapeutic solutions across diverse areas and routes of administration, for diseases that are untreatable or undruggable today.

name: Gonnado
businessDescription:
We have set ourselves the goal of making online advertising measurable at all retail checkouts. In this way, we help companies to optimize their online advertising so that it achieves the maximum ROI.
Marketing-Plattform für den stationären Handel:
Generieren Sie mehr Leads und steigern Sie Ihre Verkäufe – rein Erfolgs-basiert.
Our job is to make stationary sales measurable. We want offline sales to appear in your online statistics just like the sales in your online shop.
tags: Affiliate Marketing, Coupons, Lead Generation, Retail Technology

name: CodeCheck
businessDescription: CodeCheck empowers millions of consumers to make better purchasing decisions. CodeCheck is your personal shopping assistant when it comes to healthy and conscious consumption. Simply scan the barcode or EAN number of your food or cosmetics and in just a few seconds you can find out whether the products are vegan, vegetarian or gluten- or lactose-free. CodeCheck is a personal and easy-to-use shopping assistant for healthy and sustainable consumption. Through scanning the barcode of foods or cosmetics, the app displays a rating and product recommendations based on the latest scientific research and individual settings.

businessDescription:
Novigenix is a precision medicine firm based in Switzerland that develops ImmunoTranscriptomic technologies for illness identification, therapeutic optimization, and disease recurrence monitoring in order to enhance disease management and patient outcomes.

By combining patient multi-omics data, advanced Machine Learning, and artificial intelligence approaches, the Novigenix proprietary LITOseek platform is optimised for mapping the immune system's response to the onset and progression of disease, providing actionable insights and precision solutions for optimising the therapeutic journey of patients. Our current product roadmap includes immuno-oncology patient stratification tools, colorectal cancer early detection and recurrence monitoring, and therapy optimization systems for cancer patient management.
tags: Artificial Intelligence, Biotechnology, Health Diagnostics, Life Science, Machine Learning, Predictive Analytics

name: Pula Advisors
businessDescription:
Agricultural insurance is being reimagined to cover smallholders all across the world.
At Pula, we're reshaping insurance by utilising technology and parametric insurance to insure the 1.5 billion smallholders throughout the world who were previously unbanked, uninsured, and untapped.
We work in Africa and Asia, and in 2019 alone, we helped 1.1 million farmers get crop and animal insurance, and we sold our products in 11 countries. Our goods have benefited nearly 4.9 million smallholder farmers since we began in 2015.

name: TWINT
businessDescription:
TWINT allows you to pay simply and securely with your smartphone at the grocery checkout, online, in the farm shop, with friends, on public transportation, or when parking. TWINT is Switzerland's most popular payment app, with over three million active users.
"At TWINT, we believe that innovation should improve our lives and coexistence." That it should assist us in focusing on what is truly important: the experiences that move us. Close friends and family members. Or the company that we are passionate about. Everything that propels us forward as a group.
tags: Banking, Financial Services, FinTech, Mobile Apps

name: imperix
businessDescription:
Imperix is a Swiss company developing high-end control equipment and prototyping hardware for power electronics, drives, smart grids, and related topics. Its products are designed to enable cutting-edge innovation in corporate and academic environments. They are especially valued for their ability to accelerate the implementation of laboratory-scale power converters and facilitate the derivation of high-quality experimental results.

The company also offers various levels of integration services, intended to assist its customers in their prototyping and product development activities. As such, its offering ranges from the delivery of plug-and-play hardware and software to that of fully customized systems involving specialized control software algorithms.
tags: Electronics, Power Grid, Prototyping, Software Development

name: Locatee
businessDescription: Locatee is a workplace analytics solution that transforms data into space utilisation insights. Locatee develops a globally scalable smart building platform. The big data software solution augments the physical workspace with real-time data to create smart and occupant-oriented office buildings. The highly scalable and patent pending technology enables the analysis of the actual use of office space throughout a company's portfolio, in buildings, floors, or departments. It does not require any expensive hardware installations (e.g. sensors). Machine learning algorithms analyse and anonymise data from the existing IT infrastructure continuously and in real-time. The solution provides insights into space efficiency, mobility, and collaboration behaviour of the entire organisation.

name: Calciscon
businessDescription: Calcification Propensity Diagnostics to Prevent Cardiovascular Disease. Cardiovascular disease (CVD) is the leading cause of death, and vascular calcification is a most important driver of CVD.  Calciscon T50® test offers unprecedented clinical information of the patient’s calcification, and the T50-derived algorithm predicts the most effective drug to effectively slow down calcification: T50 could prevents up to half of the cardiovascular events in the patient group most affected by vascular calcification.

name: eDeviation
businessDescription: eDeviation supports all the operations for Protocol Deviation assessment and management. From software design and validation to collecting supporting documents and exporting data for the TMF, eDeviation® relieves your clinical team from the risks associated with missing or wrongly assessing one-time or recurring protocol deviations.

name: ProtonMail
businessDescription: ProtonMail is a service that provides easy to use secure email. ProtonMail's secure email system is designed around the principle of zero access. This means user data cannot be read by ProtonMail and turned over to third parties because ProtonMail servers do not store user encryption keys. The service is backwards compatible with insecure email providers such as Gmail and Yahoo and does not require the installation of any software to use.

name: Embotech
businessDescription: Embotech, short for embedded optimization technologies, was founded in September 2013. We strive to lead the market for numerical optimization solutions that will be integral part of tomorrow's decision making systems. The company is a spin-off of the Automatic Control Laboratory from ETH Zurich.

name: Dizmo
businessDescription: Based in Zurich, Switzerland, dizmo is an emerging software company with big ideas, invented to provide users with an easier, more direct and intuitive way to interact with their digital world. «dizmoViewer», the concrete implementation of the concept into the software platform, has been developed by a seasoned team of experts qualified in building user interfaces, web technology and large scale back-end platforms.

name: Distran
businessDescription:
Distran is a spin-off from the Autonomous System Lab, ETH Zurich, developing advanced acoustic sensors for industrial applications.
Distran's goal is to reduce risks for industrial workers and the environmental impact of the industry through the use of sound sensing and technology.

name: Frontify
businessDescription: Frontify is the brand management platform for the digital age. This leads to a new level of brand consistency over all communication channels and strengthens every brand.
