name: MUUME
businessDescription: Muume is a platform for digital services for daily consumption that consumers can use to take care of their purchases and orders on their smartphones effortlessly and in a customized manner. MUUME is an expert in digital product data management and digital payment.
tags: FinTech, Digital Shopping, Data Management, Digital Payment

name: House of Scandinavia
businessDescription:
House of Scandinavia offers modern, high-quality home textiles from a selection of the best designers, brands, and weaving companies in Scandinavia.

Scandinavian design is timeless because it is simple, clean, beautiful, finely crafted, and made with natural materials and sustainable manufacturing. It is simple and graceful at the same time. So whether you want to add that extra spice to your home, refresh your interior, or bring a gift to a good friend, the products you find here will be greatly appreciated and enjoyed for a long time.

name: Sophia Genetics
businessDescription: SOPHiA GENETICS combines deep expertise in life sciences and medical disciplines with mathematical capabilities in data computing. Our mission is to bring data analytics solutions to market, to support healthcare professionals by maximizing the power of Data-Driven Medicine. We achieve this mission through the global adoption of SOPHiA artificial intelligence. SOPHiA is built using techniques such as statistical inference, pattern recognition and machine learning. This enables SOPHiA to provide equal benefits to all users, unite experts in a gold standard health tech platform, and motivate expert knowledge sharing for a sustainable impact on future patients.
longBusinessDescription:
last News:
Lausanne, SWITZERLAND, and Boston, US – October 1, 2020: SOPHiA GENETICS, global leader in Data-Driven Medicine, announced today the closing of a $110 million financing round to enter into the next stage of its expansion, with a focus on supporting the growing clinical and biopharma demand for Data-Driven Medicine worldwide.
This Series F round was led by aMoon, a leading health-tech & life sciences venture fund based in Israel, and Hitachi Ventures, a venture arm of Japanese Hitachi Group. The company also received the trust of prime financial institutions Credit Suisse and the Pictet group. Existing investors Swisscom Ventures, Endeavour Vision, Generation Investment Management, Alychlo, and Eurazeo Growth participated in the round, as well as newcomers ACE & Company and Famille C Invest.
Having established the world’s largest Data-Driven Medicine community network through its universal and collaborative AI platform, SOPHiA GENETICS supports healthcare professionals by translating multiple sources of complex medical data into valuable clinical insights. The SOPHiA Platform is used by over 1’000 healthcare institutions and has analyzed 600’000 genomic profiles; up to 17’000 new profiles a month. Through continual learning and network effects, experts worldwide are empowered to act with confidence for better patient management.
The new funding round will boost the company’s penetration in both the US and Asian markets. Proceeds will also be dedicated to increasing the platform multimodal capabilities and its adoption by healthcare institutions worldwide. Leveraging this momentum, SOPHiA GENETICS will be best positioned to power biopharma’s effort to optimize and accelerate the development of new targeted therapies.

name: Healios AG
businessDescription:
Healios is a Medical Device Software Manufacturer that is dedicated to finding solutions in clinical research and patient monitoring through innovative digital technologies.

With novel, validated and patented Digital Biomarkers, we aim at measuring – with unprecedented sensitivity – changes in motor and cognitive functions in patients with neurological disorders.

These novel biomarkers will establish a new standard for both pharmacological research and clinical practice.

name: AgFlow
businessDescription:
AgFlow is a market information platform for agriculture trading.
AgFlow brings together people who have data and information with people who need them to create a dynamic, participative, and professional community centered around market data.
Follow the markets you trade, discover new products and new places, meet new people and open new business opportunities, do it all on AgFlow.

name: DEPsys
businessDescription:
DEPsys is a leading Swiss technology company establishing thought leadership in the energy market. It provides evolutive solutions based on GridEye platform enabling traditional power distribution networks to cope with the new constraints of decentralized production from renewable energy sources, such as photovoltaic systems and electromobility technologies.
GridEye provides an innovative technology solution for distribution system operators (DSO). Uniquely positioned with its deployment simplicity, it is the only solution that can make a grid smart in ONE day, avoiding all installation hassles with true plug & play functionality. 
GridEye is deployed and operated by DSOs in eight countries in Europe and Asia.

name: MindMaze
businessDescription: MindMaze is pioneering a breakthrough computing platform that captures brain activity upon intent, creating a new operating system for computers - a brain O/S. Based on a decade of rigorous testing in the healthcare industry, the company has designed an intuitive mind/machine interface, which utilizes pre-realtime decoding of brain signals via neural prediction. Its innovations based are poised to transform industries, starting with healthcare and gaming.

name: Scandit
businessDescription:
Founded in 2009, the Swiss startup is pioneering the use of smart data to give ‘superpowers’ to workers, customers and businesses with impressive speed, accuracy and intelligence. The Scandit Smart Data Capture platform enables smart devices, such as smartphones, drones, digital eyewear and robots to capture data from barcodes, text, IDs and objects to automate and provide insights for end-to-end processes.

Scandit accurately scans data up to three times faster than dedicated scanners in challenging light or at angles, on damaged labels, across multiple codes, with any smart device – enabling innovation that delivers significant cost savings, increases employee retention and customer loyalty.

Since its Series C funding round in May 2020, the business has more than doubled its annual recurring revenue and now has over 1700 global customers including American Eagle Outfitters, Carrefour, FedEx, Levi’s Strauss & Co., Yamato Transport and Sephora.

name: go4mobile
businessDescription:
As a future-oriented IT, support and service partner, go4mobile pursues a clear goal: We want to make the path to mobility as easy as possible for our customers.

Mobile working is becoming more and more important in order to be able to survive in the market with our own efficiency. But this step into the market holds many questions and risks. As an independent and solution-oriented IT company, we advise various customers on this topic and implement suitable products. 

The focus of our range of services is all-round support for mobile work in companies. We analyse the current situation as well as the wishes and ideas of our customers and create a mobility concept. On this basis, the individual components are implemented and, if desired, maintained by us. We also train the employees for the system set up and repair the system in the event of complications. If our customer has decided to have his own fleet of equipment, we also take care of fleet management. 

go4mobile, the all-round carefree support in the area of mobile-ICT

name: MatchOffice
businessDescription: Schnell und einfach einen Gewerberaum mieten, wo immer Sie gerade sind. Vergleichen Sie Standorte und Preise. Ihre ideale Gewerbeimmobilie ist greifbar nah!
longBusinessDescription:
Möchten Sie für Ihr Unternehmen eine konkurrenzfähige Gewerbefläche mieten? MatchOffice ist Ihnen ein zuverlässiger Partner während der Suche. Auf unserer Webseite bekommen Sie viele anspruchsvolle Gewerbeimmobilien vorgestellt, welche sie direkt vom Eigentümer mieten können. Durch unsere langjährige Erfahrung als Makler für gewerbliche Immobilien garantieren wir Ihnen den besten Service. Unser Ziel ist es, jeden Interessenten mit dem perfekten Gewerberaum zusammenzuführen. Derweil schließen sich uns immer mehr Vermieter an, die auf schnelle und effiziente Weise neue Mieter für ihre Geschäftsräume finden wollen. Indem wir ausschließlich mit verifizierten Vermietern zusammenarbeiten, haben wir uns einen beispiellosen Ruf aufgebaut.
Da unser Angebot eine große Bandbreite abdeckt, können Sie mit unserer Hilfe ganz unterschiedliche Arten von Gewerbeflächen mieten. Indem Sie dem automatischen Suchagenten Ihre Kriterien mitteilen, präsentieren wir Ihnen passende Gewerberaumlösungen an Ihrem bevorzugten Standort. Wir tun alles dafür, damit sich unsere Kunden wertgeschätzt und verstanden fühlen.
